languages.text: {n}Несколько хаотичных толчков подбрасывают площадку, а затем из недр машины приходит негодующий стон. Усилившаяся дрожь проходит сквозь рычаг в ладонь, в животе возникает странное чувство пустоты. Огненное сердце Дикаря пробуждается.{/n}

{n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько хаотичных толчков подбрасывают площадку, а затем из недр машины приходит негодующий стон. Усилившаяся дрожь проходит сквозь рычаг в ладонь, в животе возникает странное чувство пустоты. Огненное сердце Дикаря пробуждается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A few erratic jolts toss the platform, and then an indignant groan comes from the bowels of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart has awoken.{/n}

{n}A few erratic jolts toss the platform, and then an indignant groan comes from the bowels of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart has awoken.{/n}

{n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unas sacudidas erráticas hacen temblar la plataforma y las profundidades de la máquina emiten un gruñido de indignación. Un fuerte temblor recorre la palanca hasta la palma de tu mano, y se forma una extraña sensación de vacío en tu estómago. El corazón feroz de Salvaje se acelera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas sacudidas erráticas hacen temblar la plataforma y las profundidades de la máquina emiten un gruñido de indignación. Un fuerte temblor recorre la palanca hasta la palma de tu mano, y se forma una extraña sensación de vacío en tu estómago. El corazón feroz de Salvaje se acelera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数回の不規則な揺れがプラットホームを揺らし、マシンの奥から憤怒のうめき声が響く。激しい震動がレバーから手のひらに伝わり、胃の中に奇妙な空虚感が漂う。サベージの燃える心臓が蠢いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数回の不規則な揺れがプラットホームを揺らし、マシンの奥から憤怒のうめき声が響く。激しい震動がレバーから手のひらに伝わり、胃の中に奇妙な空虚感が漂う。サベージの燃える心臓が蠢いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}脚下的平台传来了几次不稳的震动，列车内部发出了愤怒的呻吟。一股强烈的颤抖穿过拉杆，传入你的手掌。你感觉胃里浮现起了某种古怪的空虚感，萨维奇火热的心在你胸中激荡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}脚下的平台传来了几次不稳的震动，列车内部发出了愤怒的呻吟。一股强烈的颤抖穿过拉杆，传入你的手掌。你感觉胃里浮现起了某种古怪的空虚感，萨维奇火热的心在你胸中激荡。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einige unregelmäßige Stöße erschüttern die Plattform, und ein empörtes Grollen dringt aus den Tiefen der Maschine. Ein intensives Zittern schießt durch den Hebel und in deine Handfläche, und dein Magen fühlt sich plötzlich eigentümlich leer an. Wilds feuriges Herz rührt sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einige unregelmäßige Stöße erschüttern die Plattform, und ein empörtes Grollen dringt aus den Tiefen der Maschine. Ein intensives Zittern schießt durch den Hebel und in deine Handfläche, und dein Magen fühlt sich plötzlich eigentümlich leer an. Wilds feuriges Herz rührt sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La plateforme est agitée de secousses erratiques, et un grondement indigné s'élève des entrailles de la machine. Une vibration intense se propage à travers le levier jusqu'à votre main, et vous ressentez une étrange sensation de vide, au creux de votre estomac. Le cœur explosif de Sauvage sort de sa torpeur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}

Le cœur explosif de Sauvage sort de sa torpeur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Platform, düzensiz birkaç darbeyle birlikte sarsılıyor ve makinenin derinliklerinden öfkeli bir inilti yayılıyor. Koldan şiddetli bir çalkantı geçerek avcuna ulaşıyor. Midendeyse tuhaf bir boşluk hissi beliriyor. Hoyrat'ın hararetli kalbi canlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A few erratic jolts shake the platform, and an indignant groan emanates from the depths of the machine. An intense shudder passes through the lever and into the palm of your hand, and there is a strange feeling of emptiness in your stomach. Savage's fiery heart is stirring.{/n}
